text: Dimitris Kremastinos (; 1 May 1942 â€“ 8 May 2020) was a Greek politician and physician. He was a member of the European Academy of Sciences and Arts. Kremastinos was the Minister of Health, Welfare and Social Insurance from 1993 to 1996. He also was a member of the Hellenic Parliament from 2000 to 2004 and again from 2009 to 2019. From 2015 to 2019, he was the Vice-President of the parliament. On 26 March 2020, Kremastinos was hospitalized in Athens with COVID-19. He died two weeks later on 8 May from the infection, aged 78. ==References== Category:1942 births Category:2020 deaths Category:Deaths from the COVID-19 pandemic in Athens Category:Greek politicians Category:Greek physicians
title: Dimitris Kremastinos
